beam_element_local_coordinate_system.png.description: Beam element diagram showing local coordinate system with nodes, displacement vectors (u1, v1, θ1, u2, v2, θ2), and angle α relative to global x-y axes

bar_element_local_coordinate_system.png.description: Bar element diagram showing two nodes (u1, u2) connected at angle α relative to global x-y coordinate system

four_element_truss_structure.png.description: Truss structure with 4 elements showing pin joints, fixed supports at nodes 1 and 4, vertical load P at node 2, with labeled dimensions l1 and l2

truss_structure_node_element_numbering.p.description: Truss structure with global coordinate system showing 4 nodes, 4 elements (labeled in red), fixed supports at nodes 1 and 4, and roller support at node 3

truss_structure_with_constraints.png.description: Truss structure diagram showing 4 nodes with element and node numbering, fixed supports at nodes 1 and 4, roller support at node 3, with global x-y coordinate system

truss_structure_reference_diagram.png.description: Truss structure showing 4 nodes, 4 elements with node and element numbering, fixed supports, and global coordinate system

truss_structure_global_system.png.description: Truss structure with 4 nodes showing global coordinate system and structural configuration

truss_structure_pointer_diagram.png.description: Truss structure showing 4 nodes with element numbering and global x-y coordinate system

truss_deformed_shape_with_plot.png.description: Truss structure with deformed shape overlay showing original configuration (dashed) and deformed configuration (solid red) with displacement plot below

ten_element_truss_structure.png.description: 10-element truss structure showing nodes 1-6, fixed supports at nodes 5 and 6, vertical loads P at nodes 2 and 4, with dimensions l and height l

truss_deformed_configuration_plot.png.description: Deformed shape plot of truss structure showing original configuration (dashed) and deformed configuration (solid red)

truss_vibration_mode_shapes.png.description: Four mode shapes of truss structure showing eigenvalue vibration modes with original (dashed) and deformed (solid red) configurations

beam_model_truss_structure.png.description: Beam model of truss structure showing 6 nodes with fixed supports at nodes 5 and 6, vertical loads P at nodes 4 and 2, with dimensions l

fifteen_element_truss_structure.png.description: 15-element truss structure showing 8 nodes, fixed supports at nodes 1 and 2, vertical loads P at nodes 4, 6, and 8, with dimensions l, h1, and h2

fifteen_element_truss_deformed_shape.png.description: Deformed shape plot of 15-element truss structure showing original configuration (dashed) and deformed configuration (solid red)

fifteen_element_truss_mode_shapes.png.description: Four mode shapes of 15-element truss structure showing eigenvalue vibration modes with original (dashed) and deformed (solid red) configurations
